00019 void Attribute::AddTagDescriptionToStr(SimpleString& str)
00020 {
00021     if(description !=  "")
00022     {
00023         str = str
00024             + "<description>"
00025             + description
00026             + "</description>";
00027     }
00028
00029     if(formatDescription != "")
00030     {
00031         str += "<formatDescription>";
00032         PutAValueInCData(formatDescription, str);
00033         str += "</formatDescription>";
00034     }
00035 }
00036
00037 void Attribute::PutAValueInCData(const SimpleString val, SimpleString& str)
00038 {
00039     str += "<![CDATA[";
00040     str += val;
00041     str += "]]>";
00042 }

00064 void Attribute::GenerateHeaderDescription(const SimpleString& type,
00065                                           const SimpleString& name,
00066                                           SimpleString& str,
00067                                           bool end)
00068 {
00069     // "<"+ type + " name=\"" + name + "\"/>" at max
00070     TemporaryMemoryBuffer MemBuff( 1 + type.GetLength() + 7 + name.GetLength() + 4 );
00071     if ( end == true )
00072     {
00073         snprintf( (char*)MemBuff, MemBuff.GetLength(), "<%s name=\"%s\"/>", type.GetStr(), name.GetStr() );
00074     }
00075     else
00076     {
00077         snprintf( (char*)MemBuff, MemBuff.GetLength(), "<%s name=\"%s\">", type.GetStr(), name.GetStr() );
00078     }
00079
00080     str += (char*)MemBuff;
00081
00082     //str = str + "<"+ type + " name=\"" + name;
00083     //if(end) str = str + "\"/>";
00084     //else  str = str + "\">";
00085 }
